languages.text: "Славно". {n}Без лишних слов дознаватель поднимает руку. До вас доносится эхо потустороннего холода{/n}
"Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Славно". {n}Без лишних слов дознаватель поднимает руку. До вас доносится эхо потустороннего холода{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, the Interrogator raises his hand. You can feel the echo of the otherworldly cold.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, the Interrogator raises his hand. You can feel the echo of the otherworldly cold.{/n}

languages.text: “很好。”{n}海因里希没再多说一句话，而是举起了手。一阵彻骨的寒冷升起。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “很好。”{n}海因里希没再多说一句话，而是举起了手。一阵彻骨的寒冷升起。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Muy bien». {n}Sin más contemplaciones, Heinrix levanta la mano. Notas el eco de una frialdad sobrenatural.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien». {n}Sin más contemplaciones, Heinrix levanta la mano. Notas el eco de una frialdad sobrenatural.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Très bien. » {n}Heinrix lève sa main sans la moindre hésitation. Vous sentez un froid glacial et surnaturel emplir l'air.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. » {n}Heinrix lève sa main sans la moindre hésitation. Vous sentez un froid glacial et surnaturel emplir l'air.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sehr gut." {n}Ohne weiteres Aufhebens hebt Heinrix die Hand. Du spürst das Echo einer außerweltlichen Kälte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr gut." {n}Ohne weiteres Aufhebens hebt Heinrix die Hand. Du spürst das Echo einer außerweltlichen Kälte.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いいだろう」{n}それ以上何も言わずに、ハインリックスは手を挙げる。別世界の冷たい響きをあなたは感じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいだろう」{n}それ以上何も言わずに、ハインリックスは手を挙げる。別世界の冷たい響きをあなたは感じた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ." {n}Heinrix, fazla oyalanmadan elini kaldırıyor. Bu dünyaya ait olmayan bir soğuğun yankısını hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}Without further ado, Heinrix raises his hand. You feel the echo of otherworldly cold.{/n}
